ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly begin to grow larger and shift to sit higher up on [npc.her] head than a normal pair of human ears would. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] quickly grows to cover them, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, they're made out of [npc.earFullDescription], #ENDIF and a feathery plume sprouts out from [npc.her] left ear#IF(npc.targetedBody.isMasculine()), growing almost a full foot from [npc.her] head#ENDIF. As the transformation finishes, [npc.she] experimentally [npc.verb(twitch)] [npc.her] new mustelid-like ears back and forth.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] Sneasel ears, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of #IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF Sneasel ears, which are positioned high up on [npc.her] head and are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
